I missed this journal. 

I went back and read a lot of the old entries (well at least the last 20) and it's interesting to see how much things change...the way that I think about people and even just how different life was last year. I miss it. I mean, I dont wanna go back to how things used to be cause at some degree i've taken a step forward, grown up a little. or at least i'd like to think so. and well, going back would be like taking a step backwards in life. 

I just think that it's amazing to observe how fast and drastically things can change. 

anyways, i've had a good day. pretty laid back and relaxing. I've been listening to great music all day long and studio class went okay. 

I had a nice talk with my mom about next year and even beyond that. I feel like my mind is in a constant debate with itself 24/7 "cranbrook or interlochen". Its just so hard cause i have many valid reasons to choose both of them. And for some reason this feels like a huge decision...like if i stay here i'm signing myself away to the wolves and putting myself on a path towards one life, but then if i go to cranbrook i'll be signing myself to a different life, one where I have to give up everything that i've grown up loving and dreaming about. There are sometimes when I just want to throw in the towel and never sing another note in my life, but then there are times when it feel so right. I get goosebumps and my hair on the back of my neck stands up. It's such a rush then and deep down i know that it's right...i'm home on stage. 

I feel like if i perform then I wont be able to settle down...but if I settle down then i'll always wonder "what if?" and when I hear about these amazing people, that i'm going to school with now, making it big out there i'll be jealous...cause i could have had a shot at that. I feel like i owe it to myself to try...but I dont want to waste my time. 

grrrrrr

i hate making decisions. i wish that there was someone that had all of the answers. 

oh well...i dont have to decide today. 
I can just sit here listening to good music and watching the lights on my christmas tree blink on and off. hmmm i should prolly write some x-mas cards. 

9 days!

so i might get rid of this one. and just so u know my new one is i_could_fall

fun stuff. school's ok. not having the time of my life or anything, but i'm not dying either, so i guess i can't complain. so um, check the other journal...that's the one that i usually post in. 

luv
~mel~

today is a great day. i've been very productive too! I scheduled all those ucky dr.'s appts that i need to go to school and signed up for seg.2 driver's ed. uh...lots and lots of chores...and wait for it....i warmed up to a high A today! a whole note higher than ever before! ahhh...but lets just see if i can still get it tomorrow. 

talked to my dad this morning. he can't come take me to dinner tonight, which means that i'm still broke for a  few more days. He bought a  new boat for the lake. A little whaler. we used to have a larger whaler, but no one ever drove it. and i never drove it cause dad and we usually got into fights when he was teaching me how. 

anyways, he kept on telling me about this new boat and how he got a smaller one thats much easier to drive. and he bought me new lifejackets. like everytime i talked to him on the phone he brought it up. it kinda annoying after a  while. I was like "why do i need to worry about driving a boat when i have to worry about parallel parking ur bus of a vehicle?" 

now i just found out from dara that he told her he had bought the boat for me to try and convince me to come down to the house for a few weeks this summer. at first i thought he was a jerk for trying to bribe me to spend time with him, but then i remembered what i had told him the last time i was there like 2 weeks ago.

I told him that being on the boat was summer for me. because it always makes me feel calm and peaceful just being able to cruise around the lake and see kids swimming and the sail boat races. it's where i spent my summers growing up, so I dont really feel like it's summer until i'm there by the lake. I told him how i missed the view of it all, and how you dont have to speak in order to talk when ur on the lake. everything's just kinda understood.  I could tell by his face when i was telling him all of this that he really took it to heart. so when you think about it...he did a really sweet thing, buying me a boat. so i can go out on it whenever i want and have that alone time to just think. and buying a boat is not inexpensive. i'm just surprised he did it so fast, when the summer's already half gone. mmm i love my daddy. he's given me sooo much. voice lessons, an excellent education, boats lol, lots and lots of "we need to have a talk" talks, lots of hugs, a new bathroom with awesome acoustics so i can sing to my heart's content, and well, as long as I work hard to his standards I have the world at my feet. and let's not forget that he gave me a huge family! now when I tell my mom she's my favorite mom, it's really saying somethin! lol 

anyways, i'd better go...my mom's takin me to look at glasses...i lost mine! ahhhh

love you all
mwah!
~mel~

today's theme : DONT LET MEL SLEEP!!!

since i've had a fucked up sleeping schedule lately I had thisw crazy idea that I wouldn't sleep last night and I'd stay up all day, then go to bed early. so...here i am...still haven't slept. counting down the hours until i can let myself doze off. but man, todaqy has been crazy. I stayed up all night reading...then I went outisde and layed curled up in the hammock with a  blanket and watched the sun come up. it was really peaceful at first, with the birds chirpping and having all that time to myself, but when i started to get really tired i wanted to shoot myself for such a stupid idea. eventually i couldn't read the book anymore cause my eyes got all blurry and such. but, obviously i pulled through.

mmmmmm i really wanna close my eyes, but i have a feeling that my mom will jump out from the shadows and catch me. she wont leave the house without me with her cause she's afraid that i'll go to sleep and screw it up. but bed sounds good...nice warm blankets and a fan running. *sigh* only like 3 hours left...

goodnight, sleep tight
no more tears
in the morning
i'll be here

and when we say goodnight
dry your eyes
because we said goodnight
and not goodbye

we said goodnight
and not goodbye.

Another uneventful day...

tried to play some josh groban songs on the horribly out of tune piano, but with my lack of piano skills it was just one big mess. 

my mom got home and we had chinese for dinner. the chinese resaurant by my house is so yummy, and there is this little old short chinese guy...he's so cute. you walk in the door and he always has this huge smile on his face and then he bows and takes you to your table. cutest little old guy in the world, i swear. 

anyways, eventually my mom said somethin about her not having to go to work tomorrow. and i asked why. she looked at me like i was dumb and said "i never work on the weekends" now that one sent me for a trip, cause i was convinced it was somewhere around like wed. night. now, during the school year this whole weekend surprise would not have been a problem at all. however in the summer there is the little thing called dad's house. I hadn't made any official plans to meet up with my dad yet, and this weekend i really wanna do things with my friends. 

So i tried to call my dad's cell phone, only to remember that a week ago a very drunk mr. east threw it into the lake. so no more cell phone. and unfortunately I dont know his new number. called his house to talk to Julie and ask her, only to find out that his new one isn't workin right. and that he was out with customers all night. so...no dad's house for me. but i'm thinkin that i can get him to come up here to the big G.R. for dinner or something. besides, i need more money. 

I got some from him the last time i went to his house with ashley, but i spent it all on books. now that is going down in history. i never thought i would ever say that! ahhhh! and now..i want more money...for more books. its funny how when i was required to read over the summer, I never did. I always hated the books we were assigned and if i went to read somethin else i would always feel guilty cause i hadn't done my hw yet! so now, i'm like a bookaholic. 

yea ok...i'm gonna go take hunter for a walk. 
luv ya!
~mel

ok so things have simmered down a little. My mom and I went to Barnes and Noble and i bought another book (what a surprise!). I think i've prolly spent at least $200 on books so far this summer. anyways, we sat in the cafe and just talked for a good two hours. She helped me understand meg a little better. and we just talked about random stuff. 
   we talked about names and she was wonderin what i might name my kids when i'm "much older" as she put it. anyways, the conversation eventually led to me asking her if I got my middle name from my great-grandmother. we call her grandma jo, which is short for josephine. anyways, I had always joked about me having the same name as my dad's high school prom date, but I was sure that it was from my Grandma b/c surely my parents wouldn't name me after some fling my dad had...but it turns out, it was the prom date! I thought it was just a funny story, but geez...
  people usually say "yea, I was named after my dad" or "this name has been in my family forever" the only thing i can say is "hi, i'm named after my dad's prom date." i mean seriously...doesn't that make you wonder how significant that night was to make my dad remember to name his daughter after her? maybe i should take another look at my birth certificate! ha! jk. i already did, and my mom really is my mom. I guess I should be kinda happy that i'm not named after my great-grandma cause i really can't stand her. She has no filter in her head, she says whatever she wants to. and she never has anything nice to say let me tell you. Now i kinda do wanna meet who i'm named after. 
   She might be questionable. afterall my dad was a trouble maker when he was in high school...my grandma tells me all of the stories about him. Like how he fit like 200 people in his house on night for a party (a very tiny house), and how people would come from out of town to go to his parties. and let's not forget the time that i read all his old yearbooks. every single person that signed said somethin along the lines of "hey billy, next time you wanna skip class count me out! i've gotten caught too many times!" or "Bill, nice parties man!" or "hi billy, will you go out with me!?!?" 
   now i know why my dad is so strict with us, cause he doesn't want us to be like him! hahahaha! oh well...it is kinda weird tho, to think that my dad was a popular jock. i'm ashamed. lol jk
   I really do love my daddy, who else would drive two hours to bring me strawberries and flowers and take me out to lunch in the middle of the school day?! anyways, i must go...i only have a limited amout of time before meg takes over the phone line again! luv you all!
~mel~

tonight is night number...ummm nvm I lost count...well we'll just say that it's night number a lot that I've stayed up into the wee hours of the morning...my mom will be getting up for work in like an hour. I just can't sleep for some reason...i've been reading a lot to make myself tired, but then even when I am tired, my brain just wont shut up. which is kinda weird for a blonde cause usually a blonde's brain doesn't do anything. but that still leaves me awake at 4 in the morning. 

people (or maybe it's just me) think of some really weird things when they are sleep deprived. like tonight...i was reading this fan site in french. and it said that Tom Felton (Draco Malfoy) has been rumored to be dating a girl named Melissa...me being in my mental state at 4:00 am thought..."hey wouldn't it be funny if i was dating him and I didn't even know it?!?!" now the problem with this is that...ha it would never happen. but he is british *sigh* there's somethin about boys with accents. 

come to think of it...I dont think it's just me that gets weird late at night. Voodoo does too, cause when we were playing apples to apples or studying, one of the two, she was convinced that she was retarded becuase her mom gave birth to her when she was 36...that's not even possible. and well, she also started singng the sound of music one time, but instead of the hills being alive with the sound of music they were alive with dirty underwear. 

I think many of my greater blonde moments have happened late at night, for instance...one time I tried to convince julia that I could multi-task. not only could I pat my head and rub my stomach, but I could walk and talk at the same time, and breathe and talk at the same time as well...but then while I was tryin to figure out why she was laughing at me, I occurred to me that no one can breath and talk at the same time. hey, even if I am turning into Jessica Simpson, at least I'll still be able to have a go at a singing career...and not a bad looking hubby either. although nick doesn't have a sexy british accent. i'd be better off with the magical asshole that i'm dating without my knowledge. 


mmmm then there are the people who are really weird while they are sleeping. Once when I was stayin up to finish a paper that I had procrastinated writing until the night before the due date, I looked over when I heard Julia sit up in bed. I went to ask her a question but she didn't answer. and then I saw that she had her hand up to her ear like she was holding a cell phone, and she was talkin to thin air. it didn't stop there tho, after like 30 seconds of talkin to this "person" she stopped mid-sentence, brought her hand down and looked at it as if she was looking at the phone, then brought it back and said " wait ur cutting out....can you hear me now?....i'll call you later!!!" then she hung up and laid back down...like 3 seconds later she woke up cause I was laughing so hard...but really...i mean...wow. only julia would have a cell phone conversation in her sleep. 

hmmmm...well...i'm tired of typing, i'm gonna go read some more and wait for my famous nonexistent boyfriend to call me. hahahahaha....okay, it really shouldn't be that funny to me. *sigh* it's not the same being hyper without CK people to be stupid with me. *tear*

gnight...or goodmorning really. 

luv ~mel

hmmm...nothin else to say, except it's nice to be home. It's good to see hunter again.

i have officially done nothing today..except read harry potter. I've spent the whole day alone, cause i didn't go to cedar point cause i was supposed to study, which i obviously didn't do anyways....

last night i was campused, so i spent even more time alone. 

I hate this. 

but on a lighter note, only two more exams = only roughy 4 more hours of school left. then i'm done and i only have to sing one more song at graduation and then i'm outa here.

part of me is wonderin if i should even do the whole goin to graduation parties thing...it would kinda screw up the whole goodbye process. cause friday is when i say goodbye to everyone and to everything that is cranbrook. and going to the parties would be like the Lord of the Rings...you think its over and you move on...oh and what do you know!it's not really over, there's like 10 more endings!!!! I just want to say goodbye and move on instead of lingering. 

I know people are telling me that it's not really goodbye... "we'll still talk" or "you'll come visit or we'll visit you!", but in all honesty I wont come and visit. the only reason i visit my old school back home is cause i have to go there to see family anyways, and those are people i've known my whole life, not just two years. 

eventually even talking online or on the phone will be awkward. we'll run out of things to say cause you all wont know the new people in my life up at interlochen and gradually i will forget about cranbrook, just like i've already started to forget some names at my old school. Once somethin is not in your life everyday it becomes less important, whether you like it or not.  

I'm sorry if this hurts or offends some of you guys, it's not that i dont value your friendship cause really you guys are awesome, more than i could have ever asked for. It's just easier this way and I just wanted to give you a heads up so you aren't suprised when I really do say goodbye, or if our inside jokes aren't as funny anymore, and my responses are shorter online, or when i finally stop returning your calls...

please know that i love you all dearly and that i've truely enjoyed this time with you, but this is a chapter in my life that needs to be closed. It's too painful to look back and wonder what if i'd stayed and how my life would be different. I wish you all happiness...

but now i have to go pack.

so, 1 down 4 to go....tomorrow is the worst of 'em all.

math and history....icky!!!
hah that rhymes...

so...tonight was fun, john is amazing and always will be. I really and starting to get an idea of what saying goodbye is going to be like in a few days. I kept on kidding myself saying that it'll be quicl and easy...the sooner i leave the better. But i'm not ready to move on. At the recital john gave me a hug...and he didn't smell like john (he wasn't wearing his cologne) and it was so weird, but i was so disappointed. Just cause that is what i smell when i think of him...just like when i think of julia i smell Chanel. so when he didn't smell like john today i felt like i lost him, as weird as that sounds. 

and then while he was singing and i just looked around the room and saw Lee and Becka and Ariel and Nick and Cheri, and well, everyone really and all of the support that each and every person gives to one another, i just feel like i'll never be able to find that anymore, ya know? 

so then we went to dinner after and john said somethin weird to me...well no weird but it made me think for the first time in a long time about how people see me. he said that when i look sad that he can't stop looking at me...at first i didn't know how to take that...but now i kinda feel mad at myself about it, cause he said that it was cause i was dramatic and i drew attention to myself...and i dont wanna be dramatic on the outside. I dont want people to be able to read my thoughts so easily. 

I wish that i could stop time and not start it again until i was ready to leave and move on. It goes by too fast when i want it to be slow and it goes too slow when i want it to fly by. 

I can't bring myself to study for exams...i feel like it's the weekend and that on monday at 8:03 i will walk into the choir room late as usual and there will be the mads warming up to get ready for yet another concert... during the year it felt like it would never end, and now that it's about to end it feels like it never should. 

the thing that really sucks is that in another two years i have to do this alll over again, maybe i'll be used to it by then.

ok well, goodluck to everyone on their exams, and i love you all. 

*mwah* 
<3 Mel
